description: Size of minimal covering code in {Z_3}^n with covering radius 1 (the next 3 terms are in the ranges 71-73, 156-186, 402-486).
comments: Because each codeword covers 2n+1 of the 3^n words, ceil(3^n/(2n+1)) is a lower bound. - _Rob Pratt_, Jan 06 2015
references: G. D. Cohen et al., Covering Codes, North-Holland, 1997, p. 174.
